title: Beer can chicken with garlic butter jacket potatoes
description: This is a fun and unusual idea for a barbecued chicken dish that results in a moist, perfectly cooked meat.
ingredients: 3 limes, juice only, plus extra lime wedges for serving
3 lemons, juice only, plus extra lemon wedges for serving
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 head lettuce, root removed, leaves separated and washed
¼ cucumber, cut in half lengthways, then into half-moon slices
